dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5870 IH: Buy American Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To prohibit the negotiation of trade agreements that include waivers of the Buy American Act.

section.header: Prohibition on negotiating trade agreements containing waivers of the Buy American Act
section.text: No funds appropriated for fiscal year 2015 or any year thereafter may be used to negotiate an agreement that includes a waiver of the Buy American Act (41 U.S.C. 8301 et seq.).
